## Summarizing content

-   Record workshops, interviews, meetings: note taking & summaries
-   Upload long reports/papers & analyse: 
    - compare 2 university annual reports, table with 10 differences
    - Grant regulatios: ask your specific questions
-   Summarizing a paper based on notes you took for other papers: [Zotero note example](https://chatgpt.com/share/67166160-4cdc-800b-8965-487a32301be8)
    
## Writing {.smaller}

- Write abstract draft given the paper
- Social media thread based on paper
- Adapt application to new position: upload CV, job call/description & motivation letter examples
- Adapt paper for submission to new journal 
    - Upload paper version, journal requirements, example papers from journal
- Emails: use email thread as context
-   [Feeding it with my papers](https://chatgpt.com/share/67166dd7-d494-800b-a652-1f0bb114d354), digital scientific twin
-   [Recommendation letter](https://chatgpt.com/share/67166d34-1fa8-800b-ba58-0bc6da8dea1b)
-   Refining [cover letter & teaching statement](https://chatgpt.com/share/67166cc1-a2bc-800b-ad9f-28eb8b5078d9)

## Getting feedback on everything

- Upload presentation slides: how to improve slides?
- Screenshot of your weekly schedule: better time management?
- Reports, papers, course syllabi...
- Career (and other) decisions & time management

## Create outline and structure suggestions

- Outline/structure for a presentation
- Course syllabus draft
- Which topics should I cover?


## Area specific research tasks

-   Surveys design
    - [develop & test MC questions](https://chatgpt.com/share/67166062-c0e4-800b-b018-07562fc3819d)
    - [check comprehensibility](https://chatgpt.com/share/6716608a-2044-800b-9461-c7508b2912b4)
    - [answer options](https://chatgpt.com/share/67166a29-9330-800b-b041-41c1b9554e8c)
-   Statistics questions: [Example](https://chatgpt.com/share/670fd64f-cd54-800b-8539-84730cb2414c) & [high quality prompt](https://www.maastrichtuniversity.nl/choose-statistics)
-   Discussion about [social media & mental health](https://chatgpt.com/share/671668f9-c280-800b-83ef-0e591c1200ca)

## Brainstorming & Exploration

-   Should I accept a journalist request? Answer ideas for [journalist interview questions](https://chatgpt.com/share/67166aa4-64e4-800b-b1fc-f5099ce4c53f) showed me that I could. 
-   [Academic application: Writing the statement on "Future research directions"](https://chatgpt.com/share/67166bc6-8c38-800b-81c7-abc648c1cbea): exploring the research focus of the group and research area I aimed for. (second half of chat)

## Tasks involving code

- Data analysis: analyse a data file and provide information about it
- Create any type of graph: e.g., a scatter plot showing x on the x-axis, y on the y-axis. 
- Which type of graph would allow to show...
- Translate code between languages
- Creating a website from scratch based on your CV
- Upload a screenshot of a website design you like and update the design â€¦

## Coaching, time planning

- Any career-related decision you want feedback on/are unsure about
- What type of job could you do with your skills? Which types of companies? Upload your CV, describe your skills. 
- For productivity coaching: Upload some data (agenda screenshot, time tracking data...)
- LLMs can be very empathic and are infinitely patient! 
- See these [slides](https://hannahmetzler.eu/ai_skills/CodingCoaching/) for examples
